column5:
I know how you feel, if you ever need to talk I’m here, if it’s too personal you can use this new app I’ve been using call “Deep”. The Deep app lets me express my emotions anonymously thru audio recordings to a caring community without any judgment. Here’s the link if interested:
 https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/myapp/id1451193612?ls=1&mt=8

Honestly, I feel like that sometimes. I get depress and don’t want to do anything, then I get even more depress knowing that I got nothing done that day. When that happens, I begin to shut down mentally. Lately, I’ve been using this new app call “Deep” to express my emotions anonymously to a supportive community and it’s been helpful. Here’s a link in case you or anyone interested in checking it out. https://apps.apple.com/us/app/deep-depression-anxiety/id1451193612

This definitely happens to me at night time as well. Lately I’ve been using this new app call “Deep” and so far it’s been helping me out.
The app lets you express your thoughts anonymously thru audio recordings to a caring community. Here’s the link in case you’re interested https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/deep-depression-anxiety/id1451193612?mt=8

Seriously it takes a lot of strength.
Usually I use the new Deep app to help me express what I’m going through anonymously thru audio recordings to a caring community.
If anyone wants to check out the Deep app, here’s the link 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/deep-depression-anxiety/id1451193612?mt=8
